text: (Napiye! Porp pirayanam) natuttaramana pirayanamakavum (atil kitaikkum verrip porulkal) elitil (perappatum verrip) porulakavum iruntal avarkal um'maip pinparriyirupparkal. Eninum (pork)kalam turamaka irukkinratu. Nankal cakti perriruntal unkalutan purappattiruppom" enru allahvin mitu anaiyitukirarkal. Avarkal tankalaiye alittuk kolkinranar, niccayamaka avarkal poyyarkal enpatai allah arivan
